1.Toe taps:
i)Stand in front of the curb or step.
ii)Rest one foot on top, toes facing down.
iii)Quickly switch legs to bring the other foot on top.
iv)Continue alternating feet.
v)As you get used to the movement, move left or right while doing toe taps.

2.Squat jumps:
i)Start with your feet shoulder-width apart.
ii)Bend your knees and lower into a squat.
iii)Swing your arms back.
iv)Quickly swing your arms upward and jump.
v)Land gently back in a squat. Repeat.

3.Standing alternating toe touches:
i)Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and arms at your sides.
ii)Brace your core.
iii)Lift your right leg straight up.
iv)Simultaneously raise your left hand up and over, reaching toward your right toes.
v)Repeat with your left leg and right hand.
